short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check if title attribute for links are the same as the link text and therefore redundant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays the link title attribute and then the link text. This is so testers can determine and advise where the title attribute is repetitive, adds no value to the link text or is useful in adding meaning to a link such as multiple 'Read more'.
